Lang: hi
Quote: हिम्मत मत हारो — जीवन में सबक मिलते रहते हैं।
Author: Unknown

Quote: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quote: Be not glad at the misfortune of another, though he may be your enemy.
Author: George Washington

Lang: Note that this journey is uniquely yours, no one elses. So the path has to be your own.
A Hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
It ain't where you start in life, it's where you end up, and what you did along the way.
The only problem we really have is we think we're not supposed to have problems! Problems call us to higher level- - face & solve them now!
Trying to predict the future is like trying to drive down a country road at night with no lights while looking out the back window.
A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.
Progress comes to those who train and train; reliance on secret techniques will get you nowhere.
We never know how high we are till we are called to rise. Then if we are true to form our statures touch the skies.
Definitions belong to the definers, not the defined.
Comedy = tragedy + time.
Learn to use your emotions to think, not think with your emotions.
The traveler sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see.
Don't settle, and don't struggle.
For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
Don't want anything. Then you get everything.
The more we value things, the less we value ourselves.
To the world you may be one person; but to one person you may be the world.
The art of being wise is knowing what to overlook.
The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
To lead an orchestra, you must turn your back on the crowd.
I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Do not look upon this world with fear and loathing. Bravely face whatever the gods offer.

Quote: Over time, loneliness gets inside you and doesn't go away.
Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

Lang: Eng
Quote: Greatness lies not in being strong, but in the right use of strength.
Author: Henry Ward Beecher

Lang: English
Quote: What you are afraid of is never as bad as what you imagine. The fear you let build up in your mind is worse than the situation that actually exists.
Author: Spencer Johnson

Lang: English
Quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
Author: Honore de Balzac
